adviseScripts.text: Watson! We have a problem...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I recently accepted a case,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: but my detective senses just aren't coming to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Why not do a rain dance?
Try going to the scene of the crime.
W-Watson...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I don't think you know what rain dances are for... Let me explain it to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: You do a rain dance to make it rain...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Just kidding.
I'm actually on my way back from the crime scene...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But maybe if I took you, I would notice something else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Let's go there right away! Carriage!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I spend time talking with Novel about a case.
I have a serious problem.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: For today's lunch...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Should I have pizza-flavored Splendamin or the chicken-flavored Splendamin?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Of course, pizza. Pizza is life.
If you are a citizen of the Ark, chicken is best.
Beep beep beep beep beep!!
My detective sense just went off!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'll choose the opposite of Watson's recommendation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: To be honest, I don't think it was worth getting worried about in the first place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Turns out she'd already decided even before I answered.
With Exia's knack for obtaining information...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: and my unbelievably accurate analyses...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Protocol should be the best squad in the Ark!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: So, why isn't that the case?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Who said it's not?
Because your squad's talents aren't all about firepower.
When I asked people on the street who the strongest squad was...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: ... approximately 95% replied Matis or Absolute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: With results like that, I can't even claim a mental victory...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: That makes sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: The pen is mightier than the sword. Hahaha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Novel, who is down in the dumps about her squad's ranking.
Watson.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to try out this new add-on I got for my watch.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Can you help me, as my assistant?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Of course.
(Make a run for it.)
You agreed!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Hey! Where are you running off to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: *Whoosh* *Zap*
All of a sudden, my mind starts to become blurry.
Haha... Sedating Watson, success!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: In the future, when necessary, I will pretend to be you and give myself excellent performance reviews...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I was unconscious for the entire discussion.
I need to send a text message to a client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But, I just can't seem to get it right! What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'll send it for you.
You just have to keep practicing.
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Watson, you are really...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: ... on the road to becoming the perfect assistant!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: *Beep*
... Text from Novel.
no,matter,how,much,I,practice
this,is,the,best,I,could,do,,,
I help Novel send a text.
I have something on my mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I want to dig through all the unsolved cases of the Ark...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But, due to tight security, it's difficult to get my hands on even just one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Sounds dangerous. You should stop before you run into trouble.
Let's ask Exia for help.
Watson...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: That's not an option for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: A detective's heart dies the moment they stop seeking the truth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: !! It was right under our noses all along!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Exia is the top hacker in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure she will be able to get around the Ark's security, easy-peasy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Novel.
These past few days...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I've had absolutely no cases.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: In fact, it's been a little too quiet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If this keeps up, the unemployment rate for detectives will reach 100%.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: There are cases everywhere. You just have to go and look for them.
It's nice to take a break once in a while.
!! By that, you mean...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text:
Real detectives don't sit around waiting for a good mystery.
They have to get out there and find them!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, Watson! This is a real epiphany!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Argh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: How can unemployment be peaceful...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I share my thoughts on unemployment rates for detectives.
There are closed-room murder cases, and then there are serial killer cases.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If you had to choose one,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: which would you choose, Watson?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: A closed-room murder case.
A serial killer case.
A sealed room.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Tight surveillance that prevents anyone from going in or out without being seen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But, a truly genius criminal can make it happen!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Like detective, like assistant! We are interested in the same crimes!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Many victims.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: By finding vague commonalities between them,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: we eventually catch the killer!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: ... They're interesting, indeed, but it seems that we have slight difference in taste.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about cases with Novel.
A rival...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I think I need a rival.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Just like how Sherlock Holmes had Professor Moriarty and Arsene Lupin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I can be your rival.
Why not ask Exotic to be your archenemy?
Uh... That's a bit...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I think it would be best if you stay as my assistant, my dear Watson.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Oh! By Exotic, you mean...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: The outlaws of the Outer Rim! Heinous criminals, sought after even by Missilis!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: They seem formidable enough to become my rival.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Novel about rivals.
I'm curious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Well, actually, more like concerned.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Why are you not wearing your usual clothes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I have a date.
Because today is the day I consult with you.
Who... With who?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: No, wait. Don't tell me. Suddenly, I'm not curious about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Uh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Is that true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Thank you. And, Watson...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: You look really cool today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I share some small talk with Novel.
Why are people losing their minds over mint chocolate?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I can't wrap my brain around it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Because they don't have to brush their teeth after eating that.
Because of a desire to be special.
Brush teeth...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If you don't brush your teeth, you will have to frequently visit the dentist...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I don't think there is a reason to like mint chocolate that much while losing out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Desire to be special?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Oh... That is interesting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: How does mint chocolate satisfy that desire!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I need to investigate this a little deeper!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I reasoned why people are crazy about mint chocolate with Novel.
Hahaha! We finally managed to crack the case and apprehend the criminal!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: In my dreams, that is...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: You're a super sleuth even when you're dreaming!
Who did the criminal turn out to be?
Thank you, Watson!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: No rest for the wicked, not even when you're in dreamland!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I grabbed the fiend by the arm,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: and said, "You sir, are the criminal! And here is the evidence!" And then...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I woke up. But it sure was a fun dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: ... Honestly, I don't remember.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: As soon as I woke up from my dream, it was all a bit of a blur.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel and I talk more about other unsolved cases.
My powers of deduction haven't been firing on all cylinders lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If this keeps up, I'm concerned I'll even start forgetting about key evidence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'll come with you.
Let's go to the hospital.
You truly are a trustworthy sidekick!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Very trustworthy indeed!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... It's not bad enough to warrant a hospital visit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But if you insist, I'll consider it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I can't stand hospitals.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel and I tried to come up with ways to improve her memory.
Hey, have you heard this line before? "The criminal is you!"
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: What a cool line.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I want to come up with my own catchphrase,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: but I'm not sure what it should be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: In the name of justice, you will not go unpunished!
You don't need a catchphrase, you're already cool as is.
I'm pretty sure I've heard that somewhere before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I want something new.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Haha, you think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I certainly wasn't expecting an answer like that, but thank you, Watson.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel and I try to formulate some cool one-liners for her during our discussion.
Watson, if there a job you would want to continue doing,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: even if you become a millionaire?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Having discussions with you.
Being a Commander.
I didn't realize these talks meant that much to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I hope they don't end anytime soon either.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Wow...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I expected an answer along those lines.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel and I fantasize about what we would do if we became millionaires.
Hmm... I'm trying to come up with a word that'll go well with my name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: But I'm struggling to find the right term.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Super Sleuth.
Exuberant.
Novel the Super Sleuth...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: That sounds great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'll go with that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel the Exuberant...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'm not so sure about that one...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Do you have anything else?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I help Novel come up with a new nickname.
Watson, are there any Nikkes you're particularly close with?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If there are, I'm curious who it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Well, you, for one.
No one yet.
R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'm honored!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I can't believe you think so highly of me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I thought we had become fairly close, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: The higher your expectations, the greater the disappointment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Novel and I share a casual conversation.
Watson, how do you relieve stress?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Whenever my sleuthing skills elude me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I get really stressed out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: You can try having a go at a logic puzzle.
I turn my brain off and try to get some sleep.
Hey, that sounds like it'd be fun!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'll go see if Exia has anything she can recommend.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Even if I sleep, my stress doesn't go away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: If anything, it only gets worse.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Novel about stress.
Today is one of those days...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I feel down in the dumps. I'd prefer to be alone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Get up to leave.
Sit down beside her.
You're actually leaving?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: All that stuff about wanting to be alone... I didn't really mean it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, Watson.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I thought I wanted to be alone, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: it's comforting having you beside me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I quietly sat and comforted Novel.
Um... Hypothetically speaking, if you were to go on a date
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: with your future girlfriend, what would you like to do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Do an escape room.
Watch a movie.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to do an escape room with my future boyfriend!
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: So... um... would you be interested in going with...
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: Oh, so you're a cinephile.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I have a hard time sitting in one spot for too long.
adviseScripts.speaker: Novel

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Novel discussing our perfect dates.
